resp = client.search(
    index="my-index-000001",
    query={
        "rule": {
            "organic": {
                "query_string": {
                    "query": "puggles"
                }
            },
            "match_criteria": {
                "query_string": "puggles",
                "user_country": "us"
            },
            "ruleset_ids": [
                "my-ruleset"
            ]
        }
    },
)
print(resp)
